channel.title: 1.0.7b Patch Notes
channel.description:
## Assassin: * Nightshade now starts with 4 uses.
## Alchemist: * Can now cure Nightshade with Crimson Potion. * Now immune to Nightshade
## Cult Leader: * New day ability Rupture. Cause a player to bleed, they will die in 2 nights unless healed. Has 4 uses.
## Hunter: * Spike Traps renamed to Bear Companion. Now instantly kills players attempting to attack you. Will not kill any other players. (Killing of players trying to convert the Hunter may be added later.)
## Poacher: * Bear Companion renamed to Spike Traps.
## Priest: * The Priest's revive now either uses their single night of death immunity or they sacrifice themselves.
## Reaper: * Icy Touch no longer usable during a trial
## Bug Fixes: * Priest can no longer be healed when using Revive

item.title: 1.0.7b Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I like this patch a lot! Balanced priest. Buffed alch. Buffed cult. Side graded Hunter. Buffed (indirectly) physician and buffed Assassin. I’m loving it!

On a side note: if you wanted to make the KPN of Assassin equal to that of the cult (not counting conversion uses and sacrifice uses) then the Assassin should have only 3 nightshade. Obviously you might not want that at all but it is an option if you do.

I would personally like to see the rapture uses tied to the erraticate uses thus giving you the option of using them faster.

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7b Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
I like how the priest is now nicely in the middle of the OP priest and the Underwhelming Priest .
Intresting choices .

Go for an early res to get three unconvertibles on the board or wait to bring back someone uber useful but risk losing your spare life in the process .

I do worry about healer light games , its ok chucking in alchemists with uber powers to combat the flood of blood , but if no alchemist spawns or if the the standard play of

day 1 rupture a “noob”
night 1 corax the “noob” to wipe out the heal squad

Read full topic

item.title: 1.0.7b Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
I think actually with that, the alc may even be pubic claimable. With these changes bleed/poison are going to basically be nonstop threats, and BD’s going to need all the help it can get to prevent them.

With these ones I can see the incentive, it’s to move alc off of the “OMG IT’S A NEUT KILL IT KILL IT!” list, not sure I fully agree with it, but I see what they are going for. 4 nightshades/bleeds to contend with, BDs going to want every healer it can get.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
For my own curiosity, on future patches, if you change class mechanics, could we have a brief explanation if why, or what you are trying to achieve? Would mean we could think about whether we feel the aims are good or if they will work?
